title: Venezuela’s propaganda machine lashes back with jokes, cartoons and sarcasm as US pressure ramps up
description: By Max Saltman, Isa Cardona, CNN (CNN) — It’s a bird! It’s a plane! It’s…not Superman? No, it’s Super Mustache, Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro’s cartoon alter-ego, here to save the South American country from peril. “Super Mustache,” which has aired on Venezuelan state TV since 2021, is just one piece of the country’s propaganda push
content:
By Max Saltman, Isa Cardona, CNN
(CNN) — It’s a bird! It’s a plane! It’s…not Superman?

title: Kone scores, then sees red as Canada blanks Venezuela in final match of 2025
description: Ismael Kone scored a goal in the first half and saw red in the second as Canada closed out its 2025 schedule with a 2-0 win over Venezuela on Tuesday in an ill-tempered match that saw both teams finish with 10 men.
content:

title: Venezuela: Opposition leader Machado releases 'freedom manifesto' from secret location
description: In the manifesto, Machado, who has welcomed US pressure on the Maduro regime, insists that Maduro must be held accountable for alleged crimes against humanity, including torture, killings, and forced disappearances
content:
Venezuela’s opposition leader María Corina Machado, who received a Nobel Peace Prize last month, has released a “freedom manifesto” outlining her vision for a “new era” in the country, one without its strongman, Nicolás Maduro.

title: Kone’s goal against Venezuela snaps goalless drought for Canada
description: Ismael Kone scored in the 23rd minute for Canada in an international friendly against Venezuela on Tuesday to snap a three-game goalless drought in international play.
content:
Ismael Kone scored in the 23rd minute for Canada in an international friendly against Venezuela on Tuesday to snap the team’s three-game goalless drought in international play.

description: President Donald Trump has authorized the CIA to prepare covert operations inside Venezuela as part of a broader pressure campaign on the Nicolás Maduro regime.
content:

title: Trump rechaza una oferta de dimisión de Maduro tras una transición de dos años: lo quiere fuera de Venezuela ya
description:
El mandatario republicano parece decantarse por continuar con operaciones encubiertas, sin autorizar un combate sobre el terreno.

title: Maquinaria propagandística de Venezuela contrataca con chistes, caricaturas y sarcasmo ante aumento de la presión de EE.UU.

title: El USS Gerald R. Ford en el Caribe: expertos alertan de riesgos para América Latina ante la ofensiva de EE.UU. contra Venezuela
description: Los analistas internacionales Francesco Tucci y Francisco Belaunde coinciden en que el despliegue del portaaviones USS Gerald R. Ford en el Caribe representa una fuerte presión sobre el régimen de Nicolás Maduro. Sostienen que la operación podría implicar a otros países de América Latina

title: Canadá cierra el año con triunfo sobre Venezuela en Florida
